response.overview: A has been director decides to make one more movie, to try to overcome a traumatic event from his army service. He approaches Yiftach, a young man who has recently finished his mandatory service, asking him to write a song for his movie.  Since his release from the army, Yftach finds himself going from one odd job to another, struggling, like so many of his peers, to find his path in life after the service. Yiftach is passionate about writing, so an opportunity to write for a movie is very appealing but when he realizes that the movie is actually about an event that happened to him and his army mates, it brings back his own repressed memories he is not yet ready to deal with. And there is this girl…who’s dating the wrong guy… It’s a movie about friendship, giving a chance and trying to figure out what’s important in life.
response.tagline: All the things I wanted to say
response.title: All the things I wanted to say
